Class TDS

  • java.lang.Object
    • TDS

  • public class TDS
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement a Symbol table by associating a scope to each block and var/function to each scope.
    Author:
    Frosqh

      • add

        public int add(org.antlr.runtime.tree.BaseTree t,
               boolean fromScope)
        Add to current scope the data described by t (if needed).
        Parameters:
        t - Tree corresponding to data to addVar
        fromScope - Is it is called for a control purpose ?
        Returns:
        2 if everything went well and 1 if it is needed to go back (e.g treatment of a function, a block ...)

      • getList
